messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] carol's day
messages.msgSnippet: Hi- Thanks for this compliment.  It s funny how people see things differently.  I often long for the day when I can lose myself in something.  I think that s
messages.messageBody:
Hi-
Thanks for this compliment. It's funny how people see things differently. I
often long for the day when I can lose myself in something. I think that's
one of the biggest hardships of having a big family for me...I have to do
everything in little bits and pieces because there's ALWAYS something more
pressing that comes up.
<< and it may be a gift of yours that is a blessing bc you
are constantly tracking so many people. >>
Take care-
Carol from WI
